title: Tailscale
summary: Access your home network from anywhere, securely. Zero config VPN that just works.
content:
Tailscale makes VPN setup feel like it doesn't exist. Install it on your devices, sign in, and suddenly everything is on the same private network â€” your home server, your work laptop, your phone on coffee shop WiFi. No port forwarding, no firewall rules, no headaches.

Built on WireGuard, it's fast and lightweight. The free tier covers up to 100 devices and 3 users, which is more than enough for personal use. Access your Home Assistant dashboard, SSH into your Raspberry Pi, or stream from your Plex server â€” all securely, from anywhere in the world.

The killer feature is MagicDNS: every device gets a memorable hostname like "laptop.tailnet" instead of random IPs. Combined with exit nodes and subnet routing, it replaces commercial VPN services for most people. Setup takes under five minutes.
